successes.title: ATLAS 3D - The 3D Scanner You Print and Build Yourself!
successes.description: ATLAS 3D is a 3D printable laser scanner kit based on the Raspberry Pi.

Pledges.description: Your name will be listed in a special thank you on our website.  You will also gain access to the project updates.

A special Bring Your Own Pi Kit early bird offering.  This kit includes the electronics boards, stepper motor, 2 lasers, power adapter, table coating, feet, cables, and all required fasteners.  This is everything you need to assemble an ATLAS 3D except for the Raspberry Pi components (Pi, SD card, wifi adapter, camera) and the 3D printed parts.
BYOP - BRING YOUR OWN PI KIT

The BYOP kit includes the electronics boards, stepper motor, 2 lasers, power adapter, table coating, feet, cables, and all required fasteners.  This is everything you need to assemble an ATLAS 3D except for the Raspberry Pi components (Pi, SD card, wifi adapter, camera) and the 3D printed parts.
BYOP - BRING YOUR OWN PI KIT: SHIPMENT #3

The BYOP kit includes the electronics boards, stepper motor, 2 lasers, power adapter, table coating, feet, cables, and all required fasteners.  This is everything you need to assemble an ATLAS 3D except for the Raspberry Pi components (Pi, SD card, wifi adapter, camera) and the 3D printed parts.
